contents.text: Welcome to Leanplum in San Francisco, helping mobile marketers drive stronger customer relationships.
Press 1 for Sales and Product Information.
Press 1 to speak with our Sales Team.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a quote for Leanplum’s enterprise plan
I’m interested in pricing and licensing options for our veteran outreach app.
I want to review enterprise pricing tiers and available modules for push notifications and in-app messaging.
I want to discuss service plans and any available senior discounts.
I’m calling to discuss enterprise license pricing and academic discounts for our university lab’s mobile engagement needs.

contents.text: Press 2 to learn about our Mobile Marketing Platform.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Ask a specialist about core features of the mobile marketing platform
I want to learn how your platform can engage veterans in my transition program.
Can you demo the SDK integration for multivariate push campaigns and A/B testing workflows?
I need someone to walk me through how the mobile marketing platform works.
I’d like a detailed demo of Leanplum’s mobile marketing platform features and APIs for my research app.

contents.text: Press 2 for Customer Support and Account Services.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot an error with my Leanplum SDK integration
I need technical help integrating the SDK into our veteran support application.
I’m getting a 401 unauthorized error in your REST API for in-app messaging—need help resolving the token exchange.
I'm unable to access my account and need help recovering my login.
I need help troubleshooting integration errors with the Leanplum SDK in my Android data‐collection app.

contents.text: Press 2 for Account and Billing Inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing team.

navigationGoals: Obtain last month’s billing statement and verify charges
I want to review and update billing info for our account.
I need an explanation for last month’s invoice, specifically the overage charges on API event calls and options for a pro-rata plan upgrade.
I have questions about my invoice and need to update my billing details.
I have a question about a billing discrepancy on my student subscription invoice.
